name: Item Card 5eTools
author: Fizzblizz
description: This is a template to display 5eTools items in the 2025 format. Note that you'll need to add 5eTools data manually by importing files from 5eTools in the "Data Sources" section of Sales&Dungeons. When done, click "Edit" on this template, go to the "Data Sources" section, remove the existing data source and add your just imported data source for the 5eTools Data. Then click "Save".
